website_summaries.verdict: This net is a good choice if you need to move bulky, yet soft-sided items like sleeping bags and camping accessories.
pros: Durable polyester, envelope style net with elastic polypropylene fabric pocket net, Choice of sizes
Attach to mounting points in the rear cargo area with four self-locking hooks
Hooks are movable, so you can configure them to any space

customer_reviews.title: Consistent Quality. Needs Length Adjustment
customer_reviews.text: These pocket storage nets seem all the same regardless of price. I have seen these range from $8.00 to $10.00. The hardware included are the same, 4 self adhesive plastic loop anchors with wood screws and 4 hooks. Whether these are all made in the same factory is inconsequential. The quality is good regardless of the retail source. One recommendation would be the ability to adjust the length of the net for better fitting.
customer_reviews.author: paititi

customer_reviews.title: Overall very pleased with the quality and price paid.
customer_reviews.text: This is as good as the more expensive ones the dealers or auto parts stores sell. It stretched to around 36 inches not very long so measure to make sure its long enough for your use. Overall very pleased with the quality and price paid. After using one in my suv, I ordered more to secure items placed on top of some garage cabinets. You cannot beat the price and they work well as a net to prevent items from falling.
customer_reviews.author: Billgon

customer_reviews.title: RV storage...perfect for bunk storage!
customer_reviews.text: Installed in our travel trailer for the bunks. The kids have storage for their clothes and things now. I wasn't about to screw into the wall so I'm only using the adhesive. We'll see how well it holds. Otherwise it's Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Seems great for a great price. Easily installed using the included hooks and my car's loops. The hooks are a bit weird because they have a loop at the bottom you don't use.. See my photo for how to use them. Time will tell how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Check before buying!
customer_reviews.text: So i made the mistake of not checking my suv (Explorer) how it would need to be attached. Unfort what is supplied won’t work with my car at all! So i had to figure out a way to make it work. It’s a great net and it serves the purpose but wish i could have installed it the proper way.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal D

customer_reviews.title: Fits a 2019 Ford Mustang perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in a 2019 Ford Mustang Ecoboost. Fits on the stock pins perfectly. It's not slack, and it doesn't get in the way of the trunk latch. Keeps my milk in place and my bread free from soup can impressions. What more can you ask of it?
customer_reviews.author: David E Webster

customer_reviews.title: Works great and the price is right
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Subaru Ascent perfectly and works great. Material is smooth unlike the last one I bought which was scratchy. Great price, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Westfalia gear storage
customer_reviews.text: Installed under the rear upper cabinet of the camper. The purpose is to stow loose items while sleeping, thus keeping the area clear of clutter. The net is easy to remove and put away when not using. NOTE: the screws are too long, so be sure to procure shorter ones for this install application.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We're using it as a removable safety "bar" on our RVs top bunk. It works great for that and the best part that I had not realized when I bought it is that it's actually a basket of sorts and things can be stored between the two layers. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaB

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my 2017 KIA Sportage LX. I use it across my tailgate in it's intended hammock style and haven't tried it flat. Adding the hooks can be a little bit of a hastle, but shouldn't be too difficult to put on/take off as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Butch F.

customer_reviews.title: Great net, Great price, needs stronger adhesive backs!! (Or superglue)
customer_reviews.text: Great product for cheap!! Fits MOST cars unless you have an extra wide or tall trunk. Only thing I’d say is that the sticky backs on the hooks needs to be stronger. My application was a process that took a while lol but I’m happy with the results!! If you’re needing to use the hooks (round parts with adhesive backs) apply E6000 or super glue to the back of them and let it set before attaching the net to them. Over all I’m satisfied with my cargo net!
customer_reviews.author: Kenn

customer_reviews.title: Great net
customer_reviews.text: This product is especially great if your car already has the hooks needed to attach it. My car had 2 hooks for the upper corners, but rings on the bottom. I had to use my own clips to properly fasten the bottom, as this product does not come with appropriate equipment for me. Otherwise, the net is durable and has been holding my tools for a couple months with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Lots cheaper than the dealer option...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 2019 Honda Odyssey. I didn't even need to install any of the hardware; the van had the hooks already built in, and the net just went right into place like it was made for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeb Hoge

customer_reviews.title: Nice net for SUVS.
customer_reviews.text: No issues, nets work fine. Comes with plenty of mounting options, but made work without modifying or using adhesive adapters on new cars. Objects hold firm in net, quality seems decent.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Bella

customer_reviews.title: Yes, This Net Is That Good
customer_reviews.text: Wow, very satisfied!!! I installed this net in my 2014 Buick Encore in under two minutes. Very easy with the hardware provided. The same net I would pay $25 for through Buick. Totally awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: If needed for a midsize vehicle look elsewhere doesn't fit on nissan Altima
customer_reviews.text: IT would of been nice if it actually fit on a 2017 Nissan Altima sl but it's too small length and width size. Doesn't reach the sides of my trunk . Maybe food for nissan Sentra or any vehicle smaller in size not for midsize vehicles...
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but effective?
customer_reviews.text: The clips broke after 30 days. The net seems well made. I'll see if i can get some better clips and go from there! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Price point .
customer_reviews.text: ... it's a cargo net for goodness sakes! I'd seen very similar items getting 3 times the amount!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L Moore

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install depending on the vehicle. Not sure how all the attachments works since no instructions were given. Semi cheap material.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Okay with you don't mind screwing attachments into your car
customer_reviews.text: Refused to screw in the attachments to my new car so I tried to work around that without success. Fits a decent amount of stuff though.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Fits equinox
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected in equinox, had to improvise bottom hook up.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works really well to secure light packages in car trunk. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Je Suis Morrisey

customer_reviews.title: This item do fit 2007 Mitsubishi Eclipse Se
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery....so far everything is holding up. I had my friend install it for me which looked pretty easy. It's worth the money a lot of little extra stuff
customer_reviews.author: Tajuanna Adams

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, but...
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, but carabiners completely not for using. Wrong shape. I must use my own carabiners for it. It’s ok for Honda Crv 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Czeslaw Borek

customer_reviews.title: nice cargo net
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and quality is good. I hung it on a wall in the back of my van to keep pillows in.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cargo net
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, easy to install. Does just what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: H Beitman

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected for my use
customer_reviews.text: Used as a storage hammock in SUV.Can’t place much of anything in cargo net. Can be used for other features like covering load or holding items in place in automobile.
customer_reviews.author: DREAMER

customer_reviews.title: Great net, Awesome Price
customer_reviews.text: What a great net that is identical to the more expensive Subaru ones. Fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Awfully bad
customer_reviews.text: Was not promised size way to small and the first clip i tried to put on broke, then i used the self adhesive and screws on the side of my truck bed and the screws where to short and everything poped off but one corner bundled everything up and sent it back!
customer_reviews.author: Midnight

customer_reviews.title: Individual needs
customer_reviews.text: I lost the kitchen doors in my RV so I used these cargo nets as replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Not Exact, but It Works
customer_reviews.text: Although it's not an exact fit for my XT5, I made it work. Keeps things in place and not rolling around the back.
customer_reviews.author: BruhMan46

customer_reviews.title: Hooked On
customer_reviews.text: Got the job done even though I needed the clips to be more flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Cheles

customer_reviews.title: True to description
customer_reviews.text: Used it for our wagon to add storage. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of this, but it broke the second time I used it— and now the return window has closed. This is an issue— I hope for a resolution.
customer_reviews.author: zepperini

customer_reviews.title: It broke off with the weight of a grocery bag within 1 month of purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Is there a warranty for your product, do you replace products that dont last even a month?Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.author: GeminiSpeak

customer_reviews.title: It was ok
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to organize my stuff in my trunk
customer_reviews.author: William quick

customer_reviews.title: Good product easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Comes with all necessary hardware. Worked perfect in trunk .
customer_reviews.author: Keith Holt

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold a lot of cargo
customer_reviews.text: Did not hold a lot. For poorly in a 2017 explorer.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Short for my trunk - see pic for dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Not long enough for the average trunk size / it does not stretches much. Pay some $ more and get a wider one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Zaf

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install! I’m a home health nurse and I keep a lot of supplies in my trunk at all times. The net keeps my supplies from sliding around everywhere. If I need to get something out, I just unhook the top corner and get whatever I need.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Fasteners not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The bottom parts don't hold well in my trunk but the tops do so I'm still able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Very short. Any vehicle it will fit is prolly not in need of a cargo organizer.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I was led to believe it would fit a truck bed. Not even close. Maybe didn’t read correctly. Either way was inexpensive and not worth time to return.
customer_reviews.author: S. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly and I already had knobs there for it. The price is great- wish ordered sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Bren911

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Used existing tail-light bolts to attach it with the included hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio S.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for the price. Works well for my car and looks to be the same quality as another oem one I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Chin Luu

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice cargo net. We use it to store the kids toys in the garage
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small didn't fit properly to the vehicle i selected for
customer_reviews.author: Leonel Lopez

product_meta.title: CARTMAN Cargo Net Hammock Trunk Organizer Vehicle Storage with 4 Adjustable Hook Black
product_meta.description: The net can adjust to fit most trunks, pickup truck beds or SUV rear cargo space. The most practical and convenient organizer for your stuff like balls, toys, hand bags, first aid kit, groceries, bottles, cans, and the likes to be organized and put them together in a secure place to access easily when needed in your most urgent mode. Keeps all your items from rolling around while driving.
feature_bullets: Large capacity: It stretches around your stuff and you can cram even more things in it than ever before, make all the items secured in place
Keep your car organized: Great storage solution to help you drive organized & be clutter-free, keep loose items from getting thrown around in your hat
Pretty handy: Envelope style with elastic polypropylene fabric pocket net, stretchy for easy loading and keep heavy items, make your life so much easier
Direct fit: Attach to mounting points in the rear cargo area with 4 self-locking hooks, all the mounting hardware is included for easy installation
Premium quality: Made out of durable polyester material to ensure longevity, thick and won't tear or rip easily, universal fit for most cars, vans, trucks

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars178 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
